com.communote.server.core.common.caching.eh

Class EhCacheManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.core.common.caching.eh.EhCacheManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CacheManager

    public class EhCacheManager
extends Object
implements CacheManager
    Implementation of the CacheManager interface using Ehcache. The Ehcache configuration is searched on the class-path and must be provided via setConfigurer(EhCacheConfigurer) before initializing the manager.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

      Invalidates the whole main cache.

      void shutdown()

    • Method Detail

      • getAdditionalCaches

        public List<String> getAdditionalCaches()
        Returns a list of all additional caches managed by CacheManager.
        Specified by:
        getAdditionalCaches in interface CacheManager
        Returns:
        a list of additional caches, an empty list if no additional caches are managed

      • getCache

        public Cache getCache()
        Returns the cache managed by this manager.
        Specified by:
        getCache in interface CacheManager
        Returns:
        the cache

      • init

        public void init(Properties properties)
        Called to initialize the cache manager from properties. The manager might use this method to initialize the associated cache.
        Specified by:
        init in interface CacheManager
        Parameters:
        properties - properties object that can contain cache manager specific settings to set up the manager

      • invalidateAdditionalCache

        public void invalidateAdditionalCache(String id)
        Invalidates the additional cache with the given id.
        Specified by:
        invalidateAdditionalCache in interface CacheManager
        Parameters:
        id - id of the cache

      • invalidateMainCache

        public void invalidateMainCache()
        Invalidates the whole main cache.
        Specified by:
        invalidateMainCache in interface CacheManager

      • setConfigurer

        public void setConfigurer(EhCacheConfigurer provider)
        Sets the configurer that should be used when initializing the EhCache. This Method must be run before calling the init(Properties) method.
        Parameters:
        provider - the provider to be used

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Shutdown hook that allows the cache manager to do any kind of clean-up operations. This method is usually called when the application is shutting down.
        Specified by:
        shutdown in interface CacheManager
